result.eng: I was moving furniture and my back is sore since then.
result.ga: Bhí mé ag aistriú troscáin agus tá mo dhroim nimhneach ó shin
result.orig: Bhí mé ag aistriú troscáin agus tá mo dhroim nimhneach ó shin
result.html: Bhí mé ag aistriú troscáin agus tá mo dhroim nimhneach ó shinI was moving furniture and my back is sore since then.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí mé ag aistriú troscáin agus tá mo ḋroim niṁneaċ ó ẛinI was moving furniture and my back is sore since then.

result.eng: Do not talk to the driver while the bus is moving.
result.ga: Ná labhair leis an tiománaí agus an bus ag gluaiseacht
result.orig: Ná labhair leis an tiománaí agus an bus ag gluaiseacht
result.html: Ná labhair leis an tiománaí agus an bus ag gluaiseachtDo not talk to the driver while the bus is moving.
result.ponchtml: Ná laḃair leis an tiománaí agus an bus ag gluaiseaċtDo not talk to the driver while the bus is moving.

result.eng: Are you thinking of moving to this area?
result.ga: An bhfuil tú ag cuimhneamh ar aistriú go dtí an ceantar seo
result.orig: An bhfuil tú ag cuimhneamh ar aistriú go dtí an ceantar seo
result.html: An bhfuil tú ag cuimhneamh ar aistriú go dtí an ceantar seoAre you thinking of moving to this area?
result.ponchtml: An ḃfuil tú ag cuiṁneaṁ ar aistriú go dtí an ceantar seoAre you thinking of moving to this area?

result.eng: I looked closely to see if anything was moving, anything at all. Am I the only living creature here?
result.ga: D'fhéach mé go grinn ag iarraidh cor a fheiceáil cor beag ar bith An mise an t-aon neach beo anseo
result.orig: D'fhéach mé go grinn ag iarraidh cor a fheiceáil cor beag ar bith An mise an t-aon neach beo anseo
result.html: D'fhéach mé go grinn ag iarraidh cor a fheiceáil cor beag ar bith An mise an t-aon neach beo anseoI looked closely to see if anything was moving, anything at all. Am I the only living creature here?
result.ponchtml: D'ḟéaċ mé go grinn ag iarraiḋ cor a ḟeiceáil cor beag ar biṫ An mise an t-aon neaċ beo anseoI looked closely to see if anything was moving, anything at all. Am I the only living creature here?
